patthana23.37:4.1: Naajjhattaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:4.2: Nabahiddhā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:5.1: Naajjhattaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:5.2: Nabahiddhā naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:6.1: Naajjhattaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:6.2: Nabahiddhā naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:6.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … avigate dve.
